'''0.0.14a_08'''<ref>{{ytl|Drmi4EZMBzs}}</ref><ref>{{link|url=https://forums.tigsource.com/index.php?topic=6273.msg205808#msg205808|title=Minecraft (alpha)|website=TIG Forums|author=[https://forums.tigsource.com/index.php?action=profile;u=3311 YagerX]|date=May 28, 2009}}</ref> is a version of [[Java Edition Classic]] released on May 28, 2009, at 20:40 UTC, which made changes.<ref name="release">[[#logs|IRC logs]]: "''(22:38:10) <@notch> restart your clients, compare fps plox =D''" [...] "''(22:38:40) <@notch> new client update, check the fps. It should be better''" [...] "''(22:39:21) <@notch> wait.. it's supposed to say _08..''" [...] "''(22:39:25) <@notch> I think I didn't upload it right''" [...] "''(22:40:13) <@notch> ok, now''" (20:38 to 20:40 UTC)</ref> This is the last version of [[Early Classic Creative]] (i.e. the last Classic version without [[multiplayer]] functions).

== Changes ==
=== Blocks ===
'''[[File:Oak Sapling JE2.png|32px]] [[Sapling]]s'''
* Now appear as full bright when in shade, and turn invisible when selected while in shade.

=== World generation ===
'''[[File:Oak JE2.png|32px]] [[Tree]]s'''
* Model changed from [[File:Oak JE1.png|32px]].<ref>[[#logs|IRC logs]]: "''[17:06] <justinforasec> notch this is just a style thing, but did u want the trees to be cubes? i found if u take off the corners they look alot more natural''" [...] "''[17:07] <@notch> oooh, that IS nicer, justinforasec'' [...] ''[17:07] <@notch> I'm definitely making it so for the next version, thank you'' [...] ''(22:46:02) <mezo> lol @ new trees''"(17:06 UTC)</ref>
** Now have a (+) shape for the top layer.

=== General ===
'''[[Light]]'''
* Shadows now show up on water and lava surfaces.<ref>[[#logs|IRC logs]]: "''[14:43] <@notch> a free bonus is that shadows now show up on water surfaces :D''" (20:43 UTC)</ref>

'''[[Fog]]'''
* Fog is now white instead of blue.<ref>[[#logs|IRC logs]]: "''[10:35] <justinforasec> i dont get why the fog is blue'' [...] ''[10:35] <justinforasec> wouldnt white or greyish be better?''"(17:06 UTC)</ref><ref>[[#logs|IRC logs]]: "''[23:07] <justinforasec> hey the fog is white!'' [...] ''[23:07] <justinforasec> ty notch''"(17:06 UTC)</ref>
* Fog now gets applied to shadow surfaces.

== Technical ==
=== Performance ===
* Improved framerate.<ref name="release" />

== Trivia ==
* The <samp>[[terrain.png]]</samp> file of this version seems to have an early texture for [[wool]], [[cloud]]s, or [[snow block]]s<ref>https://web.archive.org/web/20220522024237/https://imgur.com/a/B7Ize8x</ref>.

== Sound test ==
* [[C418]] uploaded a mockup video on June 4, 2009, showcasing his sound design for the game dubbed over footage of this version. It is important to note that this is not a developer version, the video is simply edited.<ref>{{ytl|UIFkQMEz9X8}}</ref><ref>https://web.archive.org/web/20210705014707/https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=UIFkQMEz9X8</ref>
